docs.title: FreeSurfer
docs.description:
FreeSurfer is a software package for the analysis and visualization of neuroimaging data from cross-sectional and longitudinal studies. It is developed by the Laboratory for Computational Neuroimaging at the Martinos Center for Biomedical Imaging.

FreeSurfer provides full processing streams for structural and functional MRI and includes tools for linear and nonlinear registration, cortical and subcortical segmentation, cortical surface reconstruction, statistical analysis of group morphometry, diffusion MRI, PET analysis, and much more. It is also the structural MRI analysis software of choice for the Human Connectome Project.

docs.title: Output volume
docs.description: Resampled output volume.
Resamples a volume into another field-of-view using various types of matrices (FreeSurfer, FSL, SPM, and MNI).

docs.title: Moving volume
docs.description: Input volume (or output template with --inv)

docs.title: Target volume
docs.description: Output template (or input with --inv)

docs.title: Output volume
docs.description: Output volume

docs.title: Displacement volume
docs.description: Displacement volume

docs.title: Downsample factor
docs.description: Downsample factor (e.g., 2) (do not include a targ or registration)

docs.title: Registration matrix
docs.description: tkRAS-to-tkRAS matrix (tkregister2 format)

docs.title: Linear Transform Array
docs.description: Linear Transform Array (usually only 1 transform)

docs.title: Inverted LTA
docs.description: LTA, invert (may not be the same as --lta --inv with --fstal)

docs.title: FSL matrix
docs.description: fslRAS-to-fslRAS matrix (FSL format)

docs.title: XFM matrix
docs.description: ScannerRAS-to-ScannerRAS matrix (MNI format)

docs.title: Inverse transform flag
docs.description: Sample from targ to mov

docs.title: Talairach mapping flag
docs.description: Map to a sub FOV of MNI305 (with --reg only)

docs.title: Talairach resolution
docs.description: Set voxel size 1mm or 2mm (default is 1)

docs.title: Talairach transformation file
docs.description: Path to the talairach transformation file. Default is talairach.xfm (looks in mri/transforms)

docs.title: M3Z morph file
docs.description: Non-linear morph encoded in the m3z format

docs.title: Inverse morph flag
docs.description: Compute and use the inverse of the m3z morph

docs.title: FreeSurfer target volume
docs.description: Optionally use the specified volume from the subject in --reg as target. Default is orig.mgz

docs.title: Crop factor
docs.description: Crop and change voxel size

docs.title: Slice crop range
docs.description: Crop output slices to be within specified start and end indices

docs.title: Slice reverse flag
docs.description: Reverse order of slices, update vox2ras

docs.title: Slice bias factor
docs.description: Apply half-cosine bias field

docs.title: Interpolation type
docs.description: Interpolation method: cubic, trilin, or nearest (default is trilin)

docs.title: Fill average flag
docs.description: Compute mean of all source voxels in a given target voxel

docs.title: Fill conserve flag
docs.description: Compute sum of all source voxels in a given target voxel

docs.title: Fill upsample factor
docs.description: Source upsampling factor for --fill-{avg,cons} (default is 2)

docs.title: Multiplication factor
docs.description: Multiply output by the specified value

docs.title: Output precision level
docs.description: Output precision (default is float)

docs.title: Keep input precision flag
docs.description: Set output precision to that of the input

docs.title: Trilinear interpolation kernel flag
docs.description: Save the trilinear interpolation kernel at each voxel instead of the interpolated image

docs.title: Copy ctab flag
docs.description: Setenv FS_COPY_HEADER_CTAB to copy any ctab in the mov header

docs.title: GCAM parameters
docs.description: GCAM warp procedure

docs.title: SPM Warp parameters
docs.description: SPM warp procedure

docs.title: Map point parameters
docs.description: Standalone option to map a point to another space

docs.title: Inverted LTA map point parameters
docs.description: Same as --map-point but inverts the LTA

docs.title: No resampling flag
docs.description: Do not resample, just change vox2ras matrix

docs.title: Rotation angles
docs.description: Rotation angles (degrees) to apply to registration matrix

docs.title: Translation distances
docs.description: Translation (mm) to apply to registration matrix

docs.title: Shearing factors
docs.description: Shearing factors. Sxy Sxz Syz with xz as in-plane

docs.title: Final registration matrix
docs.description: Final registration matrix after rotation and translation (but not inversion)

docs.title: Synthesize noise flag
docs.description: Replace input with white Gaussian noise

docs.title: Random seed
docs.description: Seed for synth (default is to set from time of day)

docs.title: Save registration flag
docs.description: Write out output volume registration matrix

docs.title: Debug flag
docs.description: Turn on debugging output

docs.title: Version flag
docs.description: Print out version string and exit
Resamples a volume into another field-of-view using various types of matrices (FreeSurfer, FSL, SPM, and MNI).
